definition: (of time) constituting the full extent or duration, perennial northern temperate plant with toothed leaves and heads of small purplish-white flowers
details:
adjective
- (of time) constituting the full extent or duration
= example: (of time) constituting the full extent or duration
noun
- perennial northern temperate plant with toothed leaves and heads of small purplish-white flowers
= synonyms: orpine, orpin, live-forever
